channel.title: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help

item.title: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Mine’s fine and I use this:

if(c.fightMode == 3) { c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); } else { c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); }

Read full topic
item.source: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help

item.title: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

it was already at 1.5 and i have my mage range and melee xp set at 1200. ??? oh and i found out that u get att str def and hp exp just not range prayer and mage???

or if somebody could tell/help me make like items you click on and that will give the xp.
ex: i click on a range target and it gives me range xp
ok im starting to make objects to click on and it will give you xp i have this is clickingobject.java

case 2513: // range target c.objectYOffset = 3; c.getPA().addSkillXP(exp * Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE); break;

i need something in playerassistant.java can somebody tell me what i need?

Read full topic
item.source: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help

item.title: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Config.Java > Ctrl + F > Search for Melee > Change SERVER_EXP to 1.5;

And Make the Melee rate 490 or whatever you wish.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help

item.title: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

deans1243:

i tried that and nothing happend:/ my range xp is set at 1200 so it should be giving decent xp but you think it could be that the arrows arent givint xp or idk really this has never happend to me. pleas help

In you’re config class. Is it verry different then this:?

public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 2000; public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 2000; public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 2000; public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Pi range exp help pleas[edit] combat xp help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

hey guys i need help fixing my range exp. when i attack stucf it doesnt give me and xp here is my code in combatassistant.java can anybody tell me whats wrong pleas?

[edit]
as a matter of fact none of the combat skills give xp haha can somebody pleas help me on this.

if(c.fightMode == 3) { c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); } else { c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE), c.fightMode); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.RANGE_EXP_RATE/3), 3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); }

oh and i am using tragedy pk source. and i noticed whn i first got it that they had a guy to change your skills for you so i knew something was wrong with it but can somebody help me fix it pleas.

Read full topic
